VoiceDir7.BAE4: Annoyed, to self--We just had a touching scene where our friend Donan faced his inner grief, and Mephisto showing up here is almost desecrating the moment
Line7.BAE4: What does that fiend want from me, now of all times?
VoiceDir5.BAE4: To self. Groggy/waking up. At the end of the line, realization dawns--this portal belongs to Mephisto, and you aren't happy to see him.
